action_details: Based on the hospital capacities and specializations, Hospital Pascual San Rafael is ranked first due to its available bed capacity of 20 and specializations in Trauma and Burn Unit, which are relevant for a high-severity incident with injured people. Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar ranks second as it has a higher bed capacity of 25, although it lacks specialization in Burn Unit. Hospital Dr López Cano is ranked third due to its available bed capacity of 15 and specializations in Emergency and Intensive Care Unit, but it does not specialize in Trauma or Burn Unit.
